original_text: Thus saith the whole congregation of the Lord, What trespass is this that ye have committed against the God of Israel, to turn away this day from following the Lord, in that ye have builded you an altar, that ye might rebel this day against the Lord?
korean_text: 여호와의 온 회중이 말하기를 너희가 어찌하여 이스라엘 하나님께 범죄하여 오늘 여호와를 따르는 데서 돌아서서 너희를 위하여 제단을 쌓아 너희가 오늘 여호와께 거역하고자 하느냐

sentences.original_text: Thus saith the whole congregation of the Lord
that ye have committed against the God of Israel
to turn away this day from following the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 오늘 주를 따르는 것에서 떠나려 함이니

sentences.original_text: in that ye have builded you an altar
that ye might rebel this day against the Lord?
